title: CAM: Chiropractic and Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) Your plan may include medically necessary acupuncture services and/or chiropractic care. See your medical copayment summary to confirm coverage, cost, and the number of annual visits included in your plan for these benefits. PCP referral is not required to receive covered services. To learn more about your CAM benefits, visit [Landmark Health](https://www.lhp-ca.com/Members/WHAMemberBenefits2023/tabid/170/Default.aspx) to download your plan documents. You will find a combined Summary of Benefits/Evidence of Coverage based on your plan type*. Landmark Healthplan 800.298.4875 ACUPUNCTURE BENEFITS Acupuncture is included* on all small group and individual plans, and most large group plans. Refer to [Landmark Health's plan documents](https://www.lhp-ca.com/Members/WHAMemberBenefits2023/tabid/170/Default.aspx) to confirm coverage. Includes treatment of pain related to acute neuromusculoskeletal conditions such as dysfunction of the neck, back or joints, headaches, carpal tunnel, arthritis, allergies and asthma. Typical services include: - Evaluation - Manual stimulation - Electroacupuncture - Moxibustion - Acupressure - Cupping *Small groups have Capital, Gateway and Sierra plans. Large groups have Advantage, Premier and Western plans. CHIROPRACTIC BENEFITS Chiropractic care is included* on all small group plans and most large group plans. Refer to [Landmark Health's plan documents](https://www.lhp-ca.com/Members/WHAMemberBenefits2023/tabid/170/Default.aspx) to confirm coverage. Includes treatment of pain related to acute neuromusculoskeletal conditions such as low back pain, sprains and strains, headaches, neck pain and muscle spasms. Typical services include: - History - Conjunctive physiotherapy - Examination - X-rays - Manipulation *Chiropractic benefits are not available on individual plans. Small groups have Capital, Gateway and Sierra plans. Large groups have Advantage, Premier and Western plans. Last review date: January 1, 2023
